00087 #include <xercesc/util/XMLString.hpp>
00088 #include <xercesc/dom/DOMError.hpp>
00089 #if defined(XERCES_NEW_IOSTREAMS)
00090 #include <iostream>
00091 #else
00092 #include <iostream.h>
00093 #endif
00094 
00095 #include "DOMPrintErrorHandler.hpp"
00096 
00097 bool DOMPrintErrorHandler::handleError(const DOMError &domError)
00098 {
00099     // Display whatever error message passed from the serializer
00100     if (domError.getSeverity() == DOMError::DOM_SEVERITY_WARNING)
00101         XERCES_STD_QUALIFIER cerr << "\nWarning Message: ";
00102     else if (domError.getSeverity() == DOMError::DOM_SEVERITY_ERROR)
00103         XERCES_STD_QUALIFIER cerr << "\nError Message: ";
00104     else
00105         XERCES_STD_QUALIFIER cerr << "\nFatal Message: ";
00106 
00107     char *msg = XMLString::transcode(domError.getMessage());
00108     XERCES_STD_QUALIFIER cerr<< msg <<XERCES_STD_QUALIFIER endl;
00109     XMLString::release(&msg);
00110 
00111     // Instructs the serializer to continue serialization if possible.
00112     return true;
00113 }
